verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> of the things which we have spoken <S%G3004><s%> this is the sum: <S%G2774><s%> We have <S%G2192><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> an high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is set <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of the throne <S%G2362><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> in the heavens; <S%G3772><s%>

A minister <S%G3011><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%G39><s%> and of the true <S%G228><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> pitched, <S%G4078><s%> and not man. <S%G444><s%>

For every <S%G3956><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> is ordained <S%G2525><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and sacrifices: <S%G2378><s%> why <S%G3606><s%> it is of necessity <S%G316><s%> that this <S%G5126><s%> man have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to offer. <S%G4374><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> he were on <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> he should not be a priest, <S%G2409><s%> seeing that there are priests <S%G2409><s%> that offer <S%G4374><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the law: <S%G3551><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> to the example <S%G5262><s%> and shadow <S%G4639><s%> of heavenly <S%G2032><s%> things, as Moses <S%G3475><s%> was admonished <S%G5537><s%> of God <S%G5537><s%> when he was about <S%G3195><s%> to make <S%G2005><s%> the tabernacle: <S%G4633><s%> for, See, <S%G3708><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> he, that you make <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things according <S%G2596><s%> to the pattern <S%G5179><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> to you in the mount. <S%G3735><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> has he obtained <S%G5177><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> ministry, <S%G3009><s%> by how <S%G3745><s%> much <S%G3745><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he is the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of a better <S%G2909><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was established <S%G3549><s%> on better <S%G2909><s%> promises. <S%G1860><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> that first <S%G4413><s%> covenant had been <S%G2258><s%> faultless, <S%G273><s%> then should no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> have been sought <S%G2212><s%> for the second. <S%G1208><s%>

For finding fault <S%G3201><s%> with them, he said, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when I will make <S%G4931><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> with the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> and with the house <S%G3624><s%> of Judah: <S%G2455><s%>

Not according <S%G2596><s%> to the covenant <S%G1242><s%> that I made <S%G4160><s%> with their fathers <S%G3962><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> when I took <S%G1949><s%> them by the hand <S%G5495><s%> to lead <S%G1806><s%> them out of the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they continued <S%G1696><s%> not in my covenant, <S%G1242><s%> and I regarded <S%G272><s%> them not, said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> is the covenant <S%G1242><s%> that I will make <S%G1303><s%> with the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> I will put <S%G1325><s%> my laws <S%G3551><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their mind, <S%G1271><s%> and write <S%G1924><s%> them in their hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and I will be to them a God, <S%G2316><s%> and they shall be to me a people: <S%G2992><s%>

And they shall not teach <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man his neighbor, <S%G4139><s%> and every <S%G1538><s%> man his brother, <S%G80><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> shall know <S%G1492><s%> me, from the least <S%G3398><s%> to the greatest. <S%G3173><s%>

For I will be merciful <S%G2436><s%> to their unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> and their sins <S%G266><s%> and their iniquities <S%G458><s%> will I remember <S%G3415><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more. <S%G2089><s%>

In that he said, <S%G3004><s%> A new <S%G2537><s%> covenant, he has made <S%G3822><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> old. <S%G3822><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> that which decays <S%G3822><s%> and waxes <S%G1095><s%> old <S%G1095><s%> is ready <S%G1451><s%> to vanish <S%G854><s%> away.
